steps.name: Given I am on the main application page
Loading: https://trello.com/
Refreshing the current page

Given request body: 
{
  "name": "vividus",
  "prefs_permissionLevel": "private",
  "prefs_selfJoin": false,
  "defaultLists": false,
  "prefs_background": "lime",
  "token": "a6d3c23bd3b0a0ac0b0b778d5728609df56e721d5c0763381fe5877231fc0d74"
}

When I set request headers:［
|name					|value												|
|Content-Type			|application/json									|
|accept					|application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01		|］
When I issue a HTTP ｟POST｠ request for a resource with the URL 'https://trello.com/1/boards?key=b78c7b3fe3c763546a9713e27f3f3a12'
POST https://trello.com/1/boards?key=b78c7b3fe3c763546a9713e27f3f3a12 HTTP/1.1
Response time: 636 ms
Then the response code is ｟equal to｠ '200'

org.xerial's sqlite-jdbc is not loaded.
Please provide the jar on your classpath to parse sqlite files.
See tika-parsers/pom.xml for the correct version.
Pass: HTTP response is not null [The object is not null]
Pass: HTTP response status code [Expected: a value equal to <200> Actual: <200> was equal to <200>]
When I refresh the page
Refreshing the current page
Then field located `By.xpath(//span[@class="board-tile-fade"])` exists
Total number of elements found By.xpath: //span[normalize-space(@class)="board-tile-fade"] is equal to 1
Pass: A field with attributes XPath: '//span[normalize-space(@class)="board-tile-fade"]'; Visibility: VISIBLE; exists
Pass: An element with attributes: ' XPath: '//span[normalize-space(@class)="board-tile-fade"]'; Visibility: VISIBLE;' exists
@AfterScenario
Passed verification: 3 of 3 assertions passed.
